Sequence Information.Peptide Name: pBD-1 (pBD1; porcine beta-defensin 1, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; pigs, mammals; animals; JJsn; 3S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: Single nucleotide polymorphism in the gene is documented (Pruthviraj DR et al., 2016).Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: expressed and purified from yeast.Activity: a porcine defensin homologue of human beta-defensin 2. Recombinant AMP was found to be active against S. aureus. Also:  Gram- B. pertussis.Animal model:pigs: pBD1 protected newborn piglets against B. pertussis infection (Elahi S et al., 2006).Synergy:AMPs:  Showed synergistic effect with PR-39 against E. coli and S. typhimurium.Updated 11/2015; 3/2016; activity 11/2024 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Jiang LH, Lu HR, Huang DX, Yi JB, Li LY, Lin F.2006
Literature Information.Reference: Sheng Wu Gong Cheng Xue Bao. 2006 Nov;22(6):1036-9
Literature Information.Title: [Expression of porcine beta-defensin 1 gene in Pichia pastoris] In Chinese
